com.microsoft.azure.documentdb.internal

Interface EndpointManager


  • public interface EndpointManager
    Defines an interface used to manage endpoint selection for geo-distributed database accounts in the Azure DocumentDB database service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatabaseAccount getDatabaseAccountFromAnyEndpoint()
      Gets the Database Account resource
      java.net.URI getReadEndpoint()
      Returns the current read region endpoint.
      java.net.URI getWriteEndpoint()
      Returns the current write region endpoint.
      void refreshEndpointList()
      Refreshes the client side endpoint cache.
      java.net.URI resolveServiceEndpoint(OperationType operationType)
      Returns the target endpoint for a given request.
